h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand
content: One of its more annoying new attacks is that it can also retch out a cloud of poison bugs that will fly around in front of its head and deal damage to anything nearby. You may just want to back off instead of pressing the attack during this move to avoid taking unnecessary damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
One of its more annoying new attacks is that it can also retch out a cloud of poison bugs that will fly around in front of its head and deal damage to anything nearby. You may just want to back off instead of pressing the attack during this move to avoid taking unnecessary damage.
